question: You recently read an article in newspaper about someone you know personally. You found some information is wrong. Write a letter to editor to inform him about it. Use following points: 1) What is the article about? 2) What is the error? 3) What you expect an editor to do?
text: I am writing this letter to you to draw your attention to my concern about the recent essay,  published by your newspaper.

last week I read an essay about Mr Ahmadi who is a manager of a charity institute and his institute. actually, I completely know him and his family. Also, I know his activities which are in the charity field and providing funds for poorly students.

I found you mentioned Mr Ahmadi helped  others with amounts of money collected by ordinary people.however, I completely know, that he invested some things from his family wealth, then is spend all benefit of those investments on poor people.
So I will expect your editor to do more research about her articles and after more evaluation publish them. moreover, you should provide a new essay and correct your idea about Mr Ahmadi.
Thank you for taking your time and your consideration of my letter. I looking forward will read your new explanation.
